title: 2 BR 2Ba 2 parking BACKYARD with fruit trees
posting_body: Spacious newly remodeled apartment in Burlingame.
This sunny apartment home has granite countertops, wood-like floors in the bedrooms, ceramic tile floors in the kitchen and dining area, and in the living room for easy to clean.
The patio has fruit trees like figs, plums, and citrus.
Fully equipped kitchen with the in-sink garbage disposal, dishwasher, stove, microwave, and refrigerator.
Close to transportation with just a seven-minute walk to CalTrain and a short ride to the Millbrae BART.
Only one mile to the 101 freeway and three miles to the 280 freeway.
Easy access to 92.
Minutes from Millbrae BART, Caltrain, grocery stores, restaurants, and Starbucks.
Only blocks to Safeway, Walgreens, Philz's coffee, Pizza Delfina, and Molly Stone.
Burlingame Avenue with all its restaurants and shops only blocks from your front door.
Amenities include a patio, 2 parking spots, and on-site shared coin-operated laundry.
Lease Terms:
- 12 months lease term
Monthly rent $3,295.00
Deposit $3,295.00
- Tenant is responsible for the utilities
- Credit and background checks are required for all applicants.
- No pets and no smoking.
To see this sunny apartment near transportation, shops, and restaurants in Burlingame please call.
MAYRA - Coldwell Banker Commercial at
